description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Join the Zombie Defense Squad and help protect the town from the zombie menace.  Earn cash by eradicating zombies and use this cash to purchase new weapons and ammo.  You can play offline or choose to go online and play co-op with three other people in this fast paced zombie shooter.
